messages.title: It’s high time to turn the red and blue tide
messages.content: ELECTIONS that make a real difference don’t happen very often – but this is one of them.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Break up the banks and get Britain building again, creating a sustainable economy that no longer threatens our planet’s future.
Angry that politicians have done nothing to address climate change or global poverty.
Only the Liberal Democrats will shake up the system and put £700 back in the pockets of 7 million low and middle-income families, funded by ensuring the wealthy pay their fair share.
Invest in our schools and give every child, no matter their background, a fair start in life.
A commitment to addressing climate change and acting environmentally responsibly.
Finding more fair, and increasingly affordable, tax solutions.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A strong Lib Dem vote here in Hexham will help end red-blue, will stop the Tories from taking our area for granted every again.

issues.economy: Break up the banks and get Britain building again, creating a sustainable economy.
issues.education: Invest in our schools and give every child, no matter their background, a fair start in life.
issues.environment: Angry that politicians have done nothing to address climate change or global poverty.
issues.governance: Angry that banks have been left to ride roughshod over our economy, are still handing out bonuses by the bucket load, and aren’t lending to local firms.
issues.socialWelfare: Only the Liberal Democrats will shake up the system and put £700 back in the pockets of 7 million low and middle-income families, funded by ensuring the wealthy pay their fair share.
